column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The items listed in red are the popular items.  My favorite was the goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column2: and it's served on freshly toasted
column4: where you can spread the baked tomato sauce & rich goat cheese.  It's a lovely combination
column6: but surprisingly good.  I like cheese
column8: and I love a good tomato sauce so this tapas was my absolute favorite!  Everytime I come back here I'd order it again
